title: Season’s Greetings 2025 from FCAI and ELLIS Institute Finland
content:
New initiatives are strengthening research capacity, expanding 
collaborative opportunities and establishing Finland as a leader in AI and 
ML.
creator: Amanda Alvarez

title: How can we ensure anonymity of AI systems?
content:
When training AI systems, developers need to use privacy-enhancing 
technologies to ensure that the subjects of the training data are not 
exposed, new study suggests.
creator: Amanda Alvarez

title: New information on the spread of gut bacteria that cause bloodstream infections
content:
FCAI researchers created a new epidemiological model to describe the spread 
of bacteria among humans.
creator: Amanda Alvarez

title: “Collaboration is a feature of the Finnish research community”
content:
Academy Research Fellow Ayush Bharti sees the strong collegial network as 
an asset to his research on making machine learning methods faster and more 
robust.
creator: Amanda Alvarez

title: New machine learning method offers better predictions of future disease risk
content: Predictions for developing common diseases were more accurate than before.
creator: Amanda Alvarez

title: A revolution for R&D with the missing link of machine learning — project envisions human-AI expert teams to solve grand challenges
content:
Samuel Kaski receives ERC Advanced Grant to develop new machine learning 
that is robust, generalizable and engages human experts.
creator: Amanda Alvarez

title: How to raise children in the age of AI: Seminar on the future of AI x education
content:
As children increasingly interact with AI tools and technologies in their 
everyday life, researchers across domains are investigating children’s 
experiences with these technologies.
creator: Amanda Alvarez

title: AI that mirrors how humans behave can drive better designs for keyboards and charts
content:
The human-like performance of these AI models is also transparent, paving 
the way for explainable AI and better human-computer interaction.
creator: Amanda Alvarez

title: A digital twin in the mining industry gets a machine learning boost
content:
Optimizing and visualizing the mining process requires combining physics 
and data-driven approaches.
creator: Amanda Alvarez

title: AI doctoral program launches
content:
The AI-DOC launch event brought together over 100 participants from across 
Finland.
creator: Amanda Alvarez

title: Season’s Greetings 2024 from FCAI
content:
This year has seen the launch of important national and international 
initiatives such as the doctoral program in AI and ELLIS Institute Finland.
creator: Amanda Alvarez

title: This year’s AI-focused Nobel prizes reflect the zeitgeist
content:
FCAI and University of Helsinki professor Teemu Roos breaks down why AI was 
so prominent in many of the Nobel prizes awarded in 2024.
creator: Amanda Alvarez

title: “Even the digital world needs rules”
content:
The UN Advisory Body on AI released its final report, a balancing act 
between governance, human rights, commercial interests and equity.
creator: Amanda Alvarez

title: Why are some of the best students from around the globe visiting Finland?
content:
A pilot internship program lets Berkeley students come to Finland to work 
with local researchers and leverage supercomputing capabilities.
creator: Amanda Alvarez

title: AI helps detect the severity of diabetes-related eye disease
content:
Researchers used large language models to identify diabetic retinopathy and 
classify its severity from unstructured medical reports.
creator: Amanda Alvarez

title: FCAI Community Event and NeurIPS 2024
content:
The FCAI community gathered to share recent work and celebrate NeurIPS 
submissions.
creator: Amanda Alvarez

title: Finland is strongly investing in AI and establishing an ELLIS Institute to accelerate research and attract talent
content:
Public and private sector investment are coming together to launch ELLIS 
Institute Finland.
creator: Amanda Alvarez

title: Data spaces and compute power advances in language technology and speech recogntion at FCAI
content:
The LAREINA and ALT-EDIC projects in the language technology space are 
developing speech models for special purposes and for languages with fewer 
speakers.
creator: Amanda Alvarez

title: AI for mental health and neuroscience: key insights from leading experts
content: Key takeaways from the FCAI and Helsinki Brain & Mind webinar.
creator: Amanda Alvarez

title: Major European AI/ML conference organised by the ELISE project in Helsinki
content:
200 members of the ELISE and ELLIS community met in Helsinki for the ELISE 
Wrap Up Conference and ELLIS Community Event.
creator: Amanda Alvarez
